snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission has given its home page a face-lift, but it has the same functionality as the old bare-bones Web site, including the 1994-looking "next generation" search page for regulatory filings.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has given its home page a face-lift, but it has the same functionality as the old bare-bones Web site, including the 1994-looking "next generation" search page for regulatory filings.

headline.main: A Shiny New Web Site for the S.E.C.
